meanings.definition: A person or thing that pinks.
meanings.sent1: The pinkers at the party wore colorful hats.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of pinkers walking down the street.
meanings.sent3: The pinkers in the garden looked like they were having a great time.
meanings.sent4: The pinkers in the painting seemed to come alive.

meanings.definition: To decorate with a perforated pattern.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pinkers the edges of the paper for a fancy touch.
